Now, they have 0 Barter Gold, and can only buy/sell potions (They only sell potions anyway). They are proper easter eggs now, without any game breaking.[['Morrowind.esm', 79837557]]2Creeper and Mudcrab Merchant Balance-44722-1-1.ziphttps://www.nexusmods.com/morrowind/mods/44722

#565C22Vivec Replacer _ A Lord's Man.espArjan Wardekker (Lord Gildor)Allows the player to hire guards, merchants, trainers and other NPC staff. They are mainly intended to add to the atmosphere of player homes and strongholds, but they can also be taken along during adventures. Expanded version by WH-Reaper.[['Morrowind.esm', 79837557], ['Tribunal.esm', 4565686], ['Bloodmoon.esm', 9631798], ['Dr_Data.esm', 297624], ['OAAB_Data.esm', 1384891], ['Tamriel_Data.esm', 10684550]]260zzzVivec - God the City-51777-1-3-1675185827.ziphttps://www.nexusmods.com/morrowind/mods/51777
#8A0E3DVivec Replacer _ A Lord's Man_2606606669.espArjan Wardekker (Lord Gildor)Allows the player to hire guards, merchants, trainers and other NPC staff. They are mainly intended to add to the atmosphere of player homes and strongholds, but they can also be taken along during adventures.
